items.sentence: My brother was threatened by someone waving a gun.
Take off your shoes before you come into the room.
Strange as it may seem, Tom was telling the truth.
I hope I don't need to explain your rights to you.
Tom didn't even pretend to know what was going on.
You shouldn't have told Tom your telephone number.
I'm going to teach you how to do that next Monday.
Do you really think that Tom will let you do that?
I wish that I'd brought an umbrella with me today.
I'm the one who usually helps Tom do his homework.
